name: mediamtx-edge-relay
tagline: Unified RTSP/RTMP/WebRTC ingest & restream for fleets
whatItDoes: Runs MediaMTX (formerly rtsp-simple-server) to fan-in cameras and restream to RTSP/RTMP/WebRTC.
whyItSavesTime: One binary to terminate weird camera protocols, add auth, and expose a consistent URL to your apps.
